item.title: Predicting Catalog Demand - with scikit-learn
item.author: hln.hook@gmail.com (Helena Hook)
item.description:
Continuation of Udacity project

This time we will go through this project with Python using scikit-learn and see how the results differ from eachother from previous iteration.
Weâ€™re tasked with predicting how much money a fictional company in the mail-order catalog business can expect to earn from sending out a catalog to new customers.

item.title: Predicting Default Risk
item.author: hln.hook@gmail.com (Helena Hook)
item.description: In this project, we need to decide if a new bank customer is approved for loan or not using a predictive model.

item.title: Predicting Catalog Demand
item.author: hln.hook@gmail.com (Helena Hook)
item.description: In this project, we will analyze a fictional business problem in the mail-order catalog business. We’re tasked with predicting how much money your company can expect to earn from sending out a catalog to new customers.
